description:
Law and Sengoku share memories of Corazon, and the secret of Trafalgar Law`s name. Meanwhile, Fujitora uses the destruction caused by the battle in Dressrosa as a weapon, and squares off one-on-one with Luffy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Stolz eines Mannes! – Ruffys Kopf-an-Kopf-Kampf gegen Fujitora!
La volonté d`un homme. Luffy vs. Fujitora, l`affrontement
Men`s Pride! Luffy vs. Fujitora, Head-to-Head!
Otoko no Iji: Luffy tai Fujitora Makkou Shoubu
Мужская гордость! Луффи против Фуджиторы в бою один на один!
男の意地 ルフィVS[たい]藤虎真向勝負
